name: Tanget Watch
description:
A micro-intensive, party-based, action-RPG with RTS mechanics and difficult boss fights

Customize your party

Assign classes and equip items to customize your party of four 

Defeat difficult bosses

Micro-manage your party during real-time battles against four difficult bosses

Explore the mysterious world 

Determine the development of your party by interacting with NPCs, obtaining new equipment, and discovering the next challenge

Note: this is a demo, but also a complete experience. Playtime varies depending on skill, but is approximately 1-2 hours. Feedback desired.

Created by Tyler Ahlstrom
